memberdef.type: typename std::conditional_t< PType==PT::Regressor, ArrayXf, std::conditional_t< PType==PT::BinaryClassifier, ArrayXb, std::conditional_t< PType==PT::MulticlassClassifier, ArrayXi, std::conditional_t< PType==PT::Representer, ArrayXXf, ArrayXf > > > >
memberdef.definition: using Brush::Program< PType >::RetType = typename std::conditional_t<PType == PT::Regressor, ArrayXf, std::conditional_t<PType == PT::BinaryClassifier, ArrayXb, std::conditional_t<PType == PT::MulticlassClassifier, ArrayXi, std::conditional_t<PType == PT::Representer, ArrayXXf, ArrayXf >>>>
memberdef.name: RetType

briefdescription.para: the return type of the tree when calling :func:predict.

memberdef.type: std::conditional_t< PType==PT::BinaryClassifier, ArrayXf, std::conditional_t< PType==PT::MulticlassClassifier, ArrayXXf, RetType > >
memberdef.name: TreeType

briefdescription.para: the type of output from the tree object
an enum storing the program type.
whether fit has been called
fitness
reference to search space

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::reference_wrapper< SearchSpace > s, const tree< Node > t)
memberdef.name: Program

briefdescription.para: count the (recursive) complexity of the program.
count the linear complexity of the program.
count the tree size of the program, including the weights in weighted nodes.

parameterdescription.para: whether to include the node's weight in the count.

briefdescription.para: count the size of a given subtree, optionally including the weights in weighted nodes. This function is not exposed to the python wrapper.

parameterdescription.para: whether to include the node's weight in the count.

briefdescription.para: count the tree depth of the program. The depth is not influenced by weighted nodes.
count the depth of a given subtree. The depth is not influenced by weighted nodes. This function is not exposed to the python wrapper.
count the depth until reaching the given subtree. The depth is not influenced by weighted nodes. This function is not exposed to the python wrapper.
the standard predict function. Returns the output of the Tree directly.
Specialized predict function for binary classification.
Specialized predict function for multiclass classification.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Ref< const ArrayXXf > &X, const Ref< const ArrayXf > &y)
memberdef.name: fit

briefdescription.para: Convenience function to call fit directly from X,y data.
Convenience function to call predict directly from X data.
Predict probabilities from X.

parameterdescription.para: parameter for type checking, typically left blank.

briefdescription.para: Updates the program's weights using non-linear least squares.
returns the number of weights in the program.
Get the weights of the tree as an array.

simplesect.para: ArrayXf of weights in the program, encoded in post-fix order.

briefdescription.para: Set the weights in the tree from an array of weights.

parameterdescription.para: an array of weights. The number of the weights in the tree must match the length of weights.

briefdescription.para: Iterates over the program, locking the nodes until it reaches a certain depth.

parameterdescription.para: the depth to stop locking nodes. Default 0.
whether to skip leaves and leave them unlocked. Default true.

briefdescription.para: Iterates over the program, unlocking the nodes until it reaches a certain depth. It does not protect the root nodes of logistic regression models.

parameterdescription.para: the depth to start unlocking nodes. Default 0.

briefdescription.para: Get the model as a string.

listitem.para: compact : the program as an equation.
tree : the program as a (small batch, artisinal) tree.
dot : the program in the dot language for downstream visualization.

simplesect.para: string the model in string form.

briefdescription.para: Get the model as a dot object.

parameterdescription.para: extra code passed to the beginning of the dot code.

simplesect.para: string the model in dot language.

briefdescription.para: turns program tree into a linear program.

simplesect.para: a vector of nodes encoding the program in reverse polish notation

briefdescription.para: An individual program, a.k.a. model.

parameterdescription.para: one of the ProgramType enum values.
